scripts.postinstall: npm run sass && npm run build:dll
scripts.e2e: npm run sass && npm-run-all -p -r e2e:server e2e:only
scripts.e2e:testall: npm run e2e:jit && npm run e2e:aot && npm run e2e:universal && npm run e2e:universal:aot
scripts.e2e:aot: npm run compile:e2e && npm run e2e
scripts.e2e:jit: npm run build:prod:e2e && npm run e2e
scripts.e2e:universal: npm run build:universal:prod:e2e && npm-run-all -p -r server:universal e2e:only:universal
scripts.e2e:universal:aot: npm run compile:universal:e2e && npm-run-all -p -r server:universal e2e:only:universal
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run sass
scripts.pretest:once: npm run lint && npm run sass
scripts.ci: npm run e2e:jit && npm run test:once:ci
scripts.ci:testall: npm run e2e:testall && npm run test:once:ci
scripts.clean: npm cache clean && npm run clean:compile && npm run rimraf -- node_modules doc typings coverage dist .awcache dll
scripts.compile:aot: npm run sass && npm run clean:compile && npm run ngc && npm run build:aot
scripts.compile:e2e: npm run sass && npm run clean:compile && npm run ngc && npm run build:aot:prod:e2e
scripts.compile:universal: npm run sass && npm run clean:compile && npm run ngc:universal && npm run build:universal:aot
scripts.compile:universal:e2e: npm run sass && npm run clean:compile && npm run ngc:universal && npm run build:universal:aot:prod:e2e
scripts.compile:dev: npm run sass && npm run clean:compile && npm run ngc && npm run build:aot:dev
scripts.compile:only: npm run clean:compile && npm run sass && npm run ngc
scripts.compile:watch: watch-run -i npm run compile:only -p 'src/app/**/*.ts, src/app/**/*.scss' npm run compile:only
scripts.build:aot:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:aot:prod:e2e: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:aot:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:dll: npm run clean:dll && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:prod:e2e: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:universal:aot:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:universal:aot:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:universal:aot:prod:e2e: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:universal:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:universal:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.build:universal:prod:e2e: npm run clean:dist && npm run sass && webpack
scripts.universal: npm run build:universal && npm run server:universal
scripts.universal:aot: npm run compile:universal && npm run server:universal
scripts.universal:watch: npm run build:universal && npm-run-all -p -r watch:universal server:universal
